task.title: Use custom keywords in the script view

taskbody.context: To use your defined custom keywords in the script view of a test case, do as follows:

step.cmd: The Class CustomKeywords of allows you to access all custom keywords. Enter the following syntax into the script editor:
After you type the dot character, the Content Assist function is invoked. All the custom keywords defined in your test project are displayed as below:

image.alt: A list of custom keywords displayed when Content Assist is invoked

step.cmd: Select your custom keyword and provide all parameters as required.

taskbody.result: You've added your custom keyword in the script view.
